text:
Dear Veselin,

 

If you already have the certificate which you would like to use instead of the current one, then please send us the public part (a file with a .cer extension in base64 format), so we could check if it fulfills all the requirements needed to be used on RBP. Please also note that the certificate needs to be changed on our side as well.

 

 

 

Best regards,

 



 

From: tbl_ood@mail.bg <tbl_ood@mail.bg> 
Sent: Thursday, September 26, 2019 1:35 PM
To: RBP <rbp@fgsz.hu>
Subject: RE: RBP Registration - TIBIEL EOOD

 

Dear all,

we reinstall all the certificates and everything is ok now. Thanks for our help.

I have one question so far: can we change my certificates, becouse we use current one for lot of things? I want to have one only for RBP.


--

----- Цитат от RBP (rbp@fgsz.hu <mailto:rbp@fgsz.hu> ), на 26.09.2019 в 12:06 -----

	Dear Veselin,

	 

	As mentioned below, if you does not see your new certificate at the selection part, you have to contact your IT department as it is only them who can update it on your PC.

	 

	Please let us know once it is updated from their perspective.

	 

	Best regards, 

	 

	

	 

	From: tbl_ood@mail.bg <mailto:tbl_ood@mail.bg>  <tbl_ood@mail.bg <mailto:tbl_ood@mail.bg> > 
	Sent: Thursday, September 26, 2019 12:01 PM
	To: RBP <rbp@fgsz.hu <mailto:rbp@fgsz.hu> >
	Subject: RE: RBP Registration - TIBIEL EOOD

	 

	 

	
	--

	----- Цитат от RBP (rbp@fgsz.hu <mailto:rbp@fgsz.hu> ), на 26.09.2019 в 11:41 -----

		Dear Veselin,

		 

		According to the error message, your certificate is not installed correctly.

		 

		 

		Best regards,

		 

		

		 

		From: tbl_ood@mail.bg <mailto:tbl_ood@mail.bg>  <tbl_ood@mail.bg <mailto:tbl_ood@mail.bg> > 
		Sent: Thursday, September 26, 2019 11:39 AM
		To: RBP <rbp@fgsz.hu <mailto:rbp@fgsz.hu> >
		Subject: RE: RBP Registration - TIBIEL EOOD

		 

		Dear all,

		this is what it is apper here.

		
		--

		----- Цитат от RBP (rbp@fgsz.hu <mailto:rbp@fgsz.hu> ), на 26.09.2019 в 11:30 -----

			Dear Veselin,

			 

			Please use the following link to reach our platfrom:  https://ipnew.fgsz.hu/Fgsz.Klp.Web/

			 

			 

			Best regards,

			 

			

			 

			From: tbl_ood@mail.bg <mailto:tbl_ood@mail.bg>  <tbl_ood@mail.bg <mailto:tbl_ood@mail.bg> > 
			Sent: Thursday, September 26, 2019 11:28 AM
			To: RBP <rbp@fgsz.hu <mailto:rbp@fgsz.hu> >
			Subject: RE: RBP Registration - TIBIEL EOOD

			 

			Dear all,

			This is the message when I try to enter to your sait.

			
			--

			----- Цитат от RBP (rbp@fgsz.hu <mailto:rbp@fgsz.hu> ), на 26.09.2019 в 09:58 -----

				Dear Veselin,

				 

				Certificate installation is done by your IT department to your PC. You should run your certificate file with the .p12 extension, the installation will be evident from then.

				 

				 

				Best regards,

				 

				

				 

				From: tbl_ood@mail.bg <mailto:tbl_ood@mail.bg>  <tbl_ood@mail.bg <mailto:tbl_ood@mail.bg> > 
				Sent: Thursday, September 26, 2019 9:49 AM
				To: RBP <rbp@fgsz.hu <mailto:rbp@fgsz.hu> >
				Subject: RE: RBP Registration - TIBIEL EOOD

				 

				Dear all,

				 

				could you give me a hint about how installing certificate and how to login properly in the system?

				 

				Best regards,

				Veselin Todorov

				
				--

				----- Цитат от RBP (rbp@fgsz.hu <mailto:rbp@fgsz.hu> ), на 26.09.2019 в 09:33 -----

					Dear Veselin,

					 

					I can confirm, that we have received the documents, they are already forwarded for signing. We can complete your registration on the productive RBP platform today.

					We had already set up your profile on the productive platform. I would like to kindly ask you to try to access the platform with certificate authentication and give us a feedback about the result.

					 

					If you have any further question please do not hesitate to ask.

					 

					Best regards,

					 

					

					 

					From: tbl_ood@mail.bg <mailto:tbl_ood@mail.bg>  <tbl_ood@mail.bg <mailto:tbl_ood@mail.bg> > 
					Sent: Thursday, September 26, 2019 9:07 AM
					To: RBP <rbp@fgsz.hu <mailto:rbp@fgsz.hu> >
					Subject: RE: RBP Registration - TIBIEL EOOD

					 

					Dear all,

					 

					we sent the documents on Tuesday with urgent delivery, and they should already arrived.

					Can you confirm that you received them?

					
					--

					----- Цитат от RBP (rbp@fgsz.hu <mailto:rbp@fgsz.hu> ), на 24.09.2019 в 12:09 -----

					Dear Veselin,

					 

					Here are the answers for your questions:

					 

					1.	Unfortunately you cannot enter through active directory, it is only for internal users. As an external user you can only enter using certificate authentication.
					2.	Once your NUMA is arrived and signed by FGSZ, your account will be activated on the productive platform, but please note that you have to make sure that you are added to Bulgartransgaz’s user list, and you have the necessary financial limit at Bulgartransgaz.

					 

					If you have any further questions please do not hesitate to ask.

					 

					 

					Best regards,

					 

					

					From: tbl_ood@mail.bg <mailto:tbl_ood@mail.bg>  <tbl_ood@mail.bg <mailto:tbl_ood@mail.bg> > 
					Sent: Tuesday, September 24, 2019 8:35 AM
					To: RBP <rbp@fgsz.hu <mailto:rbp@fgsz.hu> >
					Subject: RE: RBP Registration - TIBIEL EOOD

					 

					Dear all,

					thank you for your fast response.

					Today, we will send the signed Network User Membership Agreement.

					I have two questions:

					1. About the test system: can I enter through active directory and which mail and pass I need to use?

					2. After you receive signed document, how long will take to activate our account (not in test mode) and could I use active directory or I need to use only certificate authentication?

					Best regards,

					Veselin Todorov

					
					--

					----- Цитат от RBP (rbp@fgsz.hu <mailto:rbp@fgsz.hu> ), на 23.09.2019 в 08:24 -----

					Dear Veselin,

					 

					Your registration on the RBP portal was successful. I am sending you the Network User Membership Agreement attached. As a next step of the registration process, please send us two physical copies duly signed.

					You can also access our test system through the following link: https://ipnew.test.fgsz.hu/Fgsz.Klp.Web.UAT/#main

					 

					 

					Best regards,

					 

					

					 

					 

					
________________________________


					 

					From: tbl_ood@mail.bg <mailto:tbl_ood@mail.bg>  <tbl_ood@mail.bg <mailto:tbl_ood@mail.bg> > 
					Sent: Friday, September 20, 2019 1:48 PM
					To: RBP <rbp@fgsz.hu <mailto:rbp@fgsz.hu> >
					Subject: RBP Registration - TIBIEL EOOD

					 

					Dear colleagues,

					My name is Veselin Todorov, and I'm making a registration of NU to RBP. The name of NU is TIBIEL EOOD.

					So, I submit the form, but nothing happened after that. Do I need to do something more or?

					Please, becouse we have a contract for NG deliveries from 1.10.2019, could you register us as soon as possible?

					Thanks in advance!!!

					You can call me at any time on +359885851514

					Best regards,

					Veselin Todorov

					
					--
					
					
					-------------------------------------
					П.П. Знаеш ли, че можеш да си направиш сайт бързо и лесно? Нужно ти е по-малко от час и е готов. Научи как на www.superhosting.bg
					<http://ads.mail.bg/delivery/ck.php?oaparams=2__bannerid=4242__zoneid=35__OXLCA=1__cb=423bee9591__oadest=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.superhosting.bg%2Fsite-builder.php%3Futm_source%3Dmbg%26utm_medium%3Dcpm%26utm_content%3Dmail_footer%26utm_campaign%3Dnewuser_campaign2019>

Az uzenetet kizarolag a cimzett, illetve az altala meghatalmazottak hasznalhatjak fel. Ha On nem az uzenet cimzettje, ugy kerjuk, hogy telefonon, vagy e-mail-ben ertesitse errol az uzenet kuldojet es torolje az uzenetet, valamint annak osszes csatolt mellekletet a rendszerebol. Ha On nem az uzenet cimzettje, abban az esetben tilos az uzenetet vagy annak barmely csatolt mellekletet lemasolnia, elmentenie, az uzenet tartalmat barkivel kozolnie vagy azzal visszaelnie. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This message and any attachment are confidential and are legally privileged. Please note that any dissemination, distribution, copying or use of or reliance upon the information contained in and transmitted with this e-mail by or to anyone other than the recipient designated above by the sender is unauthorised and strictly prohibited. 

					 

					
					
					-------------------------------------
					П.П. Разбра ли, че Яна щяла да си прави сайт? Яна, от онази реклама. Виж сайт билдъра на СуперХостинг.БГ, за да си направиш сайт и ти.
					<http://ads.mail.bg/delivery/ck.php?oaparams=2__bannerid=4245__zoneid=35__OXLCA=1__cb=099538223c__oadest=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.superhosting.bg%2Fsite-builder.php%3Futm_source%3Dmbg%26utm_medium%3Dcpm%26utm_content%3Dmail_footer%26utm_campaign%3Dsitebuilder> 

					
					
					-------------------------------------
					П.П. Виж как една учителка по китайски реши да си направи сайт. А ти искаш ли да те намират лесно в интернет? Направи си сайт! Научи повече на www.superhosting.bg.
					<http://ads.mail.bg/delivery/ck.php?oaparams=2__bannerid=4244__zoneid=35__OXLCA=1__cb=2ed05fab69__oadest=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.superhosting.bg%2F%3Futm_source%3Dmbg%26utm_medium%3Dcpm%26utm_content%3Dmail_footer%26utm_campaign%3Dnewuser_campaign2019>
